column5: Apple Arcade’s ‘Cooking Mama: Cuisine!’ is equal parts stressful and cute
column6: We often get comments from players saying that the cooking scenes and finished dishes ... make them feel hungry, said Office Create Corp. CEO Noriyasu Togakushi.

column5: 4,000 Google cafeteria workers quietly unionized during the pandemic
column6: The people who work in Google's famous cafeterias are contract workers, excluded from the tech giant’s high wages and benefits. Over the past few years, 4,000 of them quietly unionized.
